author: english.ahram.org.eg
title: Egyptian policeman injured in blast near 6 October police station - Politics - Egypt
text:
Related Two policemen injured in blast in Egypt's Giza A police conscript was injured when a bomb went off near a police station in 6 October city just oustide Cairo on Friday, an official statement by the interior ministry read.
The blast took place while a group of ministry personnel was passing by to inspect the security conditions around the police station.
Civil defence forces and a bomb squad arrived at the scene to comb the area for more explosives, a security source told MENA.
No group has yet claimed responsibility for the bombing.
Attacks on police targets have become common since the ouster of Islamist president Mohamed Morsi in July 2013.
